description: Whether or not this request is to only add a new Meeting Pattern, not update an existing one.

Standard_Meeting_PatternObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

Standard_Meeting_PatternObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

Standard_Meeting_PatternObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

description: The Reference ID of the Meeting Pattern whose data is being updated.

Meeting_Pattern_Data.description: The Meeting Day Pattern Reference ID
Specifies the order of the Meeting Pattern to appear in prompts.

Meeting_Day_PatternObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

Meeting_Day_PatternObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

Meeting_Day_PatternObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Meeting_Pattern_Data.description: The Meeting Day Pattern specifying the days of the week for the Meeting Pattern.

description: The Web Service element containing Meeting Pattern data.

validation.validation: Choose a combination of Meeting Day Pattern Days of the Week, Recurrence, Start Time, and End Time not already in use.
End time must not be before start time.
Enter a Meeting Pattern Order value not already in use.
You cannot edit a Meeting Pattern that is in use.
